title: WTB: Old Judge Cap Anson & Mike King Kelly
author: mouschi

posts.post_title: WTB: Old Judge Cap Anson & Mike King Kelly
posts.post_content: I have an interest in buying a low grade (but sharp image) copy of these guys - my favorite would be the portraits but also LOVE the Kelly ones where there is a column or something he is leaning on, I think.  Willing to see anything, thanks!

Just saw this. I don’t know the seller...but maybe it fits what you’re looking for?


FS: N173 Old Judge Cabinet Mike King Kelly

[quote name="Luke" post=1964348]Have this one for $1500[/QUOTE]

That's a great card!  I'm looking for something with a darker image, but I appreciate you showing me.
